SELECT appr.STORE_ID, s.STORE_NAME, s.OWNER_NAME, s.STORE_PHONE, s.FOOD_CATEGORY, s.BUSINESS_HOUR, s.STORE_COMMENT, s.DESCRIPTION, s.STORE_REG_DATE AS REG_DATE, a.ROAD_ADDRESS, a.JIBUN_ADDRESS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY STORE_ID DESC) AS RN, STORE_APPROVALS.* FROM STORE_APPROVALS ) appr INNER JOIN STORE s ON s.STORE_ID = appr.STORE_ID INNER JOIN STORE_ADDRESS a ON a.STORE_ID = appr.STORE_ID WHERE appr.APPROVALS = 0 AND appr.RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM BUSINESS_REQUEST b WHERE b.STORE_ID = appr.STORE_ID ) ORDER BY STORE_ID DESC

SELECT appr.STORE_ID, s.STORE_NAME, s.OWNER_NAME, s.STORE_PHONE, s.FOOD_CATEGORY, s.BUSINESS_HOUR, s.STORE_COMMENT, s.DESCRIPTION, s.STORE_REG_DATE AS REG_DATE, a.ROAD_ADDRESS, a.JIBUN_ADDRESS FROM STORE_APPROVALS appr INNER JOIN STORE s ON s.STORE_ID = appr.STORE_ID INNER JOIN STORE_ADDRESS a ON a.STORE_ID = appr.STORE_ID WHERE appr.STORE_ID = #{storeId} AND appr.APPROVALS = 0
